short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Changes link color to blue, visited link to purple, body text to black and page background to white.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension changes global link color to blue, visited link to purple, body text to black and page background to white. No option to change colors.
